data.Summary:
As a Business Development Manager at CYDERES, I help companies and professionals achieve their security objectives and protect their assets from cyber threats. I have been working in this role since May 2020, after joining Herjavec Group, which is now CYDERES, as a Commercial Sales Representative in December 2019.

I leverage my business skills and knowledge to effectively communicate, negotiate, and collaborate with clients and partners, and to identify and pursue new opportunities and markets for CYDERES.

Some of the services that I offer and promote to my clients and prospects include: Cloud Native Analytics Platform, Enterprise Managed Detection & Response, Cloud Security, Global SOC, Security Incident Response Team, Red Team as a Service, and Insider Threat Detection & Response. These are comprehensive and cutting-edge solutions that address various security challenges and needs in the digital era.

I am passionate about delivering value and satisfaction to my clients and partners, and about learning and growing in the security industry. I am always eager to share my expertise and insights, and to hear feedback and suggestions. I invite you to contact me at taylor.fern@cyderes.com or (213)349-1543 to discuss how I can help you with your security goals.
data.Title: Business Development Manager

positions.Title: Business Development Manager
positions.Description: Herjavec Group is now CYDERES (Cyber Defense and Response)

positions.Title: Business Development
positions.Description:
Herjavec Group understands that technology alone cannot prevent today’s cyber attacks. We have expertise in comprehensive security services including:
Managed Security Services:
SOC Operations
Threat Detection
Security Technology Engineering

Professional Services:
Advisory Services
Identity Services
Technology Implementation 
Threat Management 
Incident Response

Herjavec Group delivers Co-Managed services globally supported by 5 state-of-the-art, Security Operations Center's (SOC), operating 24/7/365 by certified security professionals. Herjavec Group has offices globally including across the United States, the United Kingdom, India, and Canada.

Let's connect:(213)349-1543 or tfern@herjavecgroup.com
